name: HootingOwls
0:
”Alexa open Hooting Owls”
”Alexa ask Hooting Owls to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hooting owls
des:
Bring the night to life with the mysterious and soothing sounds of owls hooting in the distance. This skill is perfect for creating an ambiance of wild, natural serenity in your home, evoking the quiet and mystique of a forest at night. It can help in relaxation or serve as a gentle, intriguing background noise.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Hooting Owls
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
